name: Airy
description:
You're a plane sending packages to many islands within a time a limit,  So you gotta go FAST.

if you have fps drops , consider untogling fullscreen it's in the pause menu .

pause menu : only with escape key ( it actually doesn't pause the timer, woops)

        controller support(only xbox 360 tested, the others I dunno)

                 moving : only the left joystick

                dashing: X button or RB / LB

                picking up objects : A button
